TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mauritus, title = Mauritus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mauritus} }

S.FORM: Mauritus hya' ga cyux maki' tay 20 17 S, 57 33 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,040 sq km (maki' tay 181ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,030 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 10 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 1,348,242. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 43.80%, lhlahuy hya' ga 17.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 38.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Port Louis. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 12 na tay cyugal byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Ameenah Gurib, aring ryax 5 squ byacing tay 6 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Maoritos hya' ga cyox maki' tay 20 17 S, 57 33 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,040 sq km (maki' tay 181ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,030 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 10 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 1,348,242. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 43.80%, lhlahoy hya' ga 17.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 38.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Port Loois. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 12 na tay cyogal byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Ameenah Gorib, aring ryax 5 sqo byacing tay 6 sa kawas 2015 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
